summary: Completed testing of TeachTino notification system, syllabus tracking, and student query features. Backend APIs for syllabus progress are working well, but authentication-required endpoints need proper credentials. Frontend interfaces are accessible but require login for full functionality testing.

authentication_required.issue: Returns 403 Not authenticated when accessing without proper JWT token
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test notification bell functionality without valid teacher credentials

authentication_required.issue: Returns 403 Not authenticated for teacher subject list
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test syllabus tracker subject loading without authentication

authentication_required.issue: Returns 403 Not authenticated for student query submission
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test student query system without proper credentials

authentication_required.issue: Returns 403 Not authenticated for teacher query retrieval
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test teacher query answering without authentication

working_endpoints.details: Successfully updates chapter progress and sends notifications
Returns class progress with completion percentages
AI generates chapter summaries in Hinglish with formulas and key points
StudyTino can access syllabus progress data

authentication_barriers.issue: Login required to access notification bell and syllabus tracker
authentication_barriers.impact: Cannot test full functionality without valid teacher credentials

authentication_barriers.issue: Student login required to test query submission system
authentication_barriers.impact: Cannot test student query flow without valid student credentials

ui_elements_found.details: Clean interface with proper form fields
Student ID and password login system working
Found notification button in TeachTino header
Found syllabus tracker quick action button

passed_tests: Syllabus Progress Update API - Successfully updates chapter progress with AI confirmation
Syllabus Progress Class GET API - Returns progress data with completion percentages
Syllabus Analytics API - Provides detailed analytics for different time ranges
AI Lesson Summary Generation - Creates comprehensive chapter summaries in Hinglish
StudyTino Syllabus Progress API - Students can access their progress data
TeachTino Login Page - Accessible and properly structured
StudyTino Login Page - Accessible with student ID login system
Frontend UI Elements - Notification bell and syllabus tracker buttons present
action_item_for_main_agent: The core syllabus tracking and AI summary features are working well. Authentication-required endpoints (notifications, teacher subjects, student queries) need valid credentials for full testing. Consider providing demo teacher and student accounts or implementing a test mode for comprehensive testing. The UI elements are present but require login to test full functionality.

success_percentage.backend: 67% - Core syllabus APIs working, authentication endpoints need credentials
success_percentage.frontend: 60% - UI elements present, login required for full functionality testing
